name: DecisionMaker
0:
”Alexa, start decision maker”
”yes or no?”
”Should I do this thing?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: decision maker
des: An Alexa application that can make yes or no decisions for you. Just ask a yes or no question and allow Alexa to give you the answer.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
